      • parseFasta

        public static java.lang.String parseFasta(java.io.File file)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Parses single sequence Fasta input file. Will only read first sequence if multiple sequences in file.
        Parameters:
        file - to parse
        Returns:
        String containing sequence
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • parseQueryFasta

                                                 int size)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Pareses Fasta file containing multiple sequences into a String[]
        Parameters:
        file - to parse
        size - number of sequences
        Returns:
        String[] of all sequences in file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • find

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> find(java.lang.String q,
                                                          java.lang.String s,
                                                          int[] suffixArr,
                                                          int[] lcp,
                                                          int l,
                                                          int h)
        Finds all locations of substring in string using suffix array and lcp array
        Parameters:
        q - substring query
        s - string to search
        suffixArr - suffix array for s
        lcp - lcp array for s
        l - start of search section
        h - end of search section
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing index of starting locations of each match
